meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the neuroptera, an order of insects with four membranous wings having a network of veins.
meanings.sent1: The neuropteral wings of the dragonfly shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the neuropteral features of different insect species to understand their evolution.
meanings.sent3: The neuropteral insects had a fancy party in the garden, showing off their delicate wings.
meanings.sent4: Her neuropteral beauty was compared to that of a butterfly, graceful and intricate.
meanings.sent5: The neuropteral patterns on the wings were like a delicate lace, mesmerizing to behold.

meanings.definition: An insect belonging to the order Neuroptera, characterized by four membranous wings with a network of veins.
meanings.sent1: The neuropteral flutter of the lacewing caught the eye of the curious child.
meanings.sent2: A neuropteral can be easily identified by the intricate patterns on its wings.
meanings.sent3: The neuropteral decided to take up painting to express its love for flying.
meanings.sent4: The neuropteral danced through the air like a delicate ballerina, enchanting all who watched.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the neuropteral as it gracefully soared through the garden, a true marvel of nature.
